entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Humidity: 98 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
